{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":2973554,"name":null,"username":"DrTeeth","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/d/ba9def/{size}.png","created_at":"2021-10-27T14:01:22.973Z","cooked":"

Does anyone know if there is a Canadian supplier for the FRC edition of the Romi?
We are new and are looking to acquire a couple to give our mentors a chance to attempt programming before we have to attempt it with students.

","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":13,"updated_at":"2021-10-27T14:01:22.973Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":99,"reads":156,"readers_count":155,"score":526.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":396845,"topic_slug":"romi-supplier-in-canada","display_username":null,"primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":49697,"hidden":false,"trust_level":1,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/romi-supplier-in-canada/396845/1","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":2973564,"name":"Brian Wagg","username":"cad321","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/c/c57346/{size}.png","created_at":"2021-10-27T14:36:22.800Z","cooked":"

Not to my knowledge (but would love to be proven wrong!). I remember spending a decent amount of time (1-2 hours probably) trying to find a Canadian source when I first learned about the ROMI initiative. Ended up conceding to the fact we would likely need to order directly from Pololu if we decided to purchase any for the team.

","post_number":2,"post_type":1,"posts_count":13,"updated_at":"2021-10-27T14:36:22.800Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":2,"reads":151,"readers_count":150,"score":40.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":396845,"topic_slug":"romi-supplier-in-canada","display_username":"Brian Wagg","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":19532,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"Brian Wagg"},"post_url":"/t/romi-supplier-in-canada/396845/2","custom_user_title":"Brian Wagg","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":2973672,"name":null,"username":"veg","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/v/3be4f8/{size}.png","created_at":"2021-10-27T21:13:01.116Z","cooked":"

Is there a reason you can’t order direct from Pololu?

pololu.com

Pololu - Romi Robot Kit for FIRST - Red

This robot based on the Romi chassis and 32U4 control board provides a platform that FRC (FIRST Robotics Competition) students can program using the full suite and libraries that are used to program competition robots, making it a great teaching tool...

","post_number":3,"post_type":1,"posts_count":13,"updated_at":"2021-10-27T21:13:01.116Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":5,"reads":135,"readers_count":134,"score":57.0,"yours":false,"topic_id":396845,"topic_slug":"romi-supplier-in-canada","display_username":null,"primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"link_counts":[{"url":"https://www.pololu.com/product/4022","internal":false,"reflection":false,"title":"Pololu - Romi Robot Kit for FIRST - Red","clicks":24}],"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":48088,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":""},"post_url":"/t/romi-supplier-in-canada/396845/3","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":2973684,"name":null,"username":"DrTeeth","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/d/ba9def/{size}.png","created_at":"2021-10-27T21:57:06.249Z","cooked":"

Our purchasing department can get a bit weird about us ordering internationally if there are Canadian vendors. Plus we would like to avoid international shipping costs and any duty that we incur. If nothing else is available, I guess that’s how we’ll have to go. Just thought Id check first.

","post_number":4,"post_type":1,"posts_count":13,"updated_at":"2021-10-27T21:57:06.249Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":3,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":1,"reads":116,"readers_count":115,"score":93.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":396845,"topic_slug":"romi-supplier-in-canada","display_username":null,"primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"reply_to_user":{"id":48088,"username":"veg","name":null,"avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/v/3be4f8/{size}.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":2}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":49697,"hidden":false,"trust_level":1,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/romi-supplier-in-canada/396845/4","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":2}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":2,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":2973708,"name":"Mr.R^2","username":"Mr.R_2","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/mr.r_2/{size}/89723_2.png","created_at":"2021-10-27T22:35:46.691Z","cooked":"

I am not sure if this helps, but I think Digikey sells them. However, they do not stock them (they actually ship from Pololu) so even if they have a location in Canada, I do not know if that will help with the shipping problem.

Edit: I realized two things.

  1. I looked it up, and it looks like Digikey.ca does not carry them.

2)Before anyone gets too excited and thinks about using their voucher (asauming we get a digikey voucher again this year) toward one, since it is not stocked by Digikey, you cannot use your voucher toward it (at least we could not last year).

","post_number":5,"post_type":1,"posts_count":13,"updated_at":"2021-10-28T02:22:20.751Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":4,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":6,"reads":117,"readers_count":116,"score":53.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":396845,"topic_slug":"romi-supplier-in-canada","display_username":"Mr.R^2","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":2,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":49697,"username":"DrTeeth","name":null,"avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/d/ba9def/{size}.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":30291,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":""},"post_url":"/t/romi-supplier-in-canada/396845/5","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":2973765,"name":"Joe Ross","username":"Joe_Ross","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/joe_ross/{size}/37_2.png","created_at":"2021-10-28T02:17:20.110Z","cooked":"

It looks like pololu has 11 distributors in Canada, have you checked those?

","post_number":6,"post_type":1,"posts_count":13,"updated_at":"2021-10-28T02:17:20.110Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":3,"reads":107,"readers_count":106,"score":51.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":396845,"topic_slug":"romi-supplier-in-canada","display_username":"Joe Ross","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":1}],"moderator":true,"admin":false,"staff":true,"user_id":65,"hidden":false,"trust_level":4,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/romi-supplier-in-canada/396845/6","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":1,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":2974475,"name":"Eric Gaudet","username":"egaudet","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/egaudet/{size}/9195_2.png","created_at":"2021-11-01T23:32:35.894Z","cooked":"

I’ve checked the 11 Canadian distributors and haven’t found any that sell the Romi kit. RobotShop (one I frequently buy from) shows the chassis and the encoders as catalogue items. Canada Robotix has the articulating arm and a gripper kit in stock. That’s all I could find.

It would really be nice to have stock in Canada because the estimated shipping costs to Ontario are about $43 USD for FedEx (not including duties, brokerage, etc) and USPS is about $63 USD! That’s just crazy for something that small and light. I’d expect around $15.

","post_number":7,"post_type":1,"posts_count":13,"updated_at":"2021-11-01T23:32:35.894Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":1,"reads":88,"readers_count":87,"score":27.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":396845,"topic_slug":"romi-supplier-in-canada","display_username":"Eric Gaudet","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":28584,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"4917 Software Mentor"},"post_url":"/t/romi-supplier-in-canada/396845/7","custom_user_title":"4917 Software Mentor","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":2974476,"name":null,"username":"DrTeeth","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/d/ba9def/{size}.png","created_at":"2021-11-01T23:49:49.865Z","cooked":"

Thank you for checking. I thought I had responded earlier. I checked the Canadian suppliers and came to the same conclusions. Amazon.ca has the chassis and wheels but not the motor controller. I bit the bullet and ordered a couple from pololu. I’ll keep you posted on what it costs by the time it is delivered. At this point I’m starting to think I should have just bought another RoboRio.

","post_number":8,"post_type":1,"posts_count":13,"updated_at":"2021-11-01T23:49:49.865Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":7,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":1,"reads":84,"readers_count":83,"score":36.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":396845,"topic_slug":"romi-supplier-in-canada","display_username":null,"primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"reply_to_user":{"id":28584,"username":"egaudet","name":"Eric Gaudet","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/egaudet/{size}/9195_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":1}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":49697,"hidden":false,"trust_level":1,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/romi-supplier-in-canada/396845/8","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":1,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":2974896,"name":"Eric Gaudet","username":"egaudet","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/egaudet/{size}/9195_2.png","created_at":"2021-11-04T12:06:25.141Z","cooked":"

I emailed Pololu and they said that not having the cheapest shipping option (USPS untracked) was a mistake. Fixed now. There’s a cheaper ~$26 option vs $43 and $63. It’s only good for one unit as that shipping method has a limit of $200 of product. And you’re taking a no-tracking, no-insurance risk.

Also, as a public-service-announcement, don’t forget that you also need a Raspberry Pi 3 or 4 to get this to work (not included). Make sure you can find one! They are in short supply.

","post_number":9,"post_type":1,"posts_count":13,"updated_at":"2021-11-04T12:06:25.141Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":1,"reads":66,"readers_count":65,"score":53.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":396845,"topic_slug":"romi-supplier-in-canada","display_username":"Eric Gaudet","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":2}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":28584,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"4917 Software Mentor"},"post_url":"/t/romi-supplier-in-canada/396845/9","custom_user_title":"4917 Software Mentor","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":2}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":2,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":2974928,"name":null,"username":"veg","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/v/3be4f8/{size}.png","created_at":"2021-11-04T15:27:13.373Z","cooked":"

And don’t forget the micro SD card. 4GB is plenty, if you can find one that small.

If you’re looking to save money, you could order the Romi parts individually and solder them up yourself. I’ve built a couple dozen of them so far - it takes 1 - 2 hours per kit above what you’d spend with the FIRST bundle, and takes a reasonable amount of soldering skill.

By my math, you can get the Romi chassis ($29.95) extra caster ($2.95) controller ($49.95) and encoder boards ($9.95) individually and get your per-kit price below $100 USD. You also then have your choice of colors.

If you go this route, feel free to PM me for some construction tips.

","post_number":10,"post_type":1,"posts_count":13,"updated_at":"2021-11-04T15:27:13.373Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":9,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":1,"reads":61,"readers_count":60,"score":52.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":396845,"topic_slug":"romi-supplier-in-canada","display_username":null,"primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"reply_to_user":{"id":28584,"username":"egaudet","name":"Eric Gaudet","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/egaudet/{size}/9195_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":2}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":48088,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":""},"post_url":"/t/romi-supplier-in-canada/396845/10","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":2}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":2,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":2974942,"name":"Eric Gaudet","username":"egaudet","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/egaudet/{size}/9195_2.png","created_at":"2021-11-04T15:50:27.241Z","cooked":"

Thanks @veg. Good point about the SD card.

And really good to know that you can assemble your own. I was wondering if that was possible because I also noticed that it seemed cheaper to buy the parts than the whole. I won’t go that route this year but if I decide to buy a bunch, the cost savings will add up. Plus stock seems to be spotty on the finished product.

","post_number":11,"post_type":1,"posts_count":13,"updated_at":"2021-11-04T15:50:27.241Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":3,"reads":60,"readers_count":59,"score":42.0,"yours":false,"topic_id":396845,"topic_slug":"romi-supplier-in-canada","display_username":"Eric Gaudet","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":1}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":28584,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"4917 Software Mentor"},"post_url":"/t/romi-supplier-in-canada/396845/11","custom_user_title":"4917 Software Mentor","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":1,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":2974962,"name":null,"username":"DrTeeth","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/d/ba9def/{size}.png","created_at":"2021-11-04T17:48:42.208Z","cooked":"

I bit the bullet and grabbed a couple Romi kits from Pololu. You can buy the chassis on Amazon for around $30 but beware several of the sellers want $40 to ship them. I managed to sell my first born and get a couple of 4gb pi 4s from PiShop.ca. They will only let you order one per month per account right now. I looked into buying all of the components separately but the controller card seems to be a customized shield to mount on the Romi chassis and I could only source it from Pololu. Hopefully it’s all sorted now. Might have been cheaper to just go buy a new RoboRio. lol
